## buildRequestFileObject() function

This function builds a `form-data` object for each file parameter.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function buildRequestFileObject(fileParam: FileWithMetadata): Promise<FileObject>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  fileParam | [FileWithMetadata](./ibm-cloud-sdk-core.filewithmetadata.md) | The FileWithMetadata instance that contains the file information |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[FileObject](./ibm-cloud-sdk-core.fileobject.md)<!-- -->&gt;

the FileObject instance
